void reversearr(int *arr,int n)
{
     int temp;
     int j,i;
      for(i=0;i<n/2;i++)
      {
                       temp=arr[i];
                       arr[i]=arr[n-1-i];
                       arr[n-1-i]=temp;
      }
}
int main()
{
    int n,i,k,j,sum;
    int arr[50];
    int newarr[50];
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n!=0)
    {
               for(i=0;i<n;i++)
               {
                               scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
               }
               sort(arr,arr+n);
               /*for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                               cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
               cout<<endl;*/
               reversearr(arr,n);
               /*for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                               cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
               cout<<endl;*/
               k=0;
               if(n%2==0)
               {
                         j=n/2;
                         for(i=0;i<=n/2-1;i++)
                         {
                                     newarr[k++]=arr[j];
                                     newarr[k++]=arr[i];
                                     j++;
                         }
               }
               else
               {
                   j=n/2+1;
                   for(i=0;i<=n/2-1;i++)
                   {
                                 newarr[k++]=arr[j];
                                 newarr[k++]=arr[i];
                                 j++;       
                   }
                   newarr[k]=arr[i];
               }
               if(n==1)
               {
                       cout<<arr[0]<<endl;
               }
               else
               {
               sum=0;
               for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
               {
                               //cout<<newarr[i]<<" ";
                               sum=sum+abs(newarr[i]-newarr[i+1]);
               }
               printf("%d\n",sum);
               }
               scanf("%d",&n);
    }
    return 0;
}
